game.title: Dragon's Challenge
game.objective: Defeat the Dragon of Mount peaks to save the village.
game.description: The brave knights of Highmountain seek your help in vanquishing the dread dragon that has taken hold of their home.
game.reward: 150 gold coins, a magical shield, and the honor of the Dragon Slayer

task.description: Talk to the wise elder in Highmountain and learn about the dragon's vulnerable spots.
Use the gathered information to forge an enchanted weapon that can defeat the dragon.
Scale the mountain and face the dragon in its lair, hidden among the caverns.

task.objective: Defeat the Dragon of the Peaks.
task.description: Use your prepared weapon to vanquish the dragon and save the land.
Return to Highmountain and share your triumph with the villagers.
